text.value: Three letters for district then 2-3 numbers
Is the burn severity similar within a 30 m radius?
Includes leaves that have fallen after the burn but not unburned patches
Approximate the percentage of area not burned. A large patch is at least 2 m by 2 m. A small patch is smaller than 2 m by 2 m.
Broken leaf pieces that form a type of mulch under the litter layer. If necessary, scrape down to mineral soil to see how deeply the char has penetrated.
Logs greater than 6 mm diameter that were on the ground prior to the burn.
Less than half the log is blackened
More than half the log is blackened
Deep char with charcoal pieces beneath log
Take a landscape photo of ground surface.
Dominant vegetation at near-surface before burn
Record first few letters of species common name or Scientific name (genus/species). i.e., for Jarrah use 'Jar' or 'Eucmar'
How much area did the near-surface fuel cover before the burn? First ask, was it more than half (50%)? Then ask if it was more than 25% or more than 75%.
Approximate the percentage of area not burned. A large patch is at least 2 m by 2 m. A small patch is smaller than 2 m by 2 m.
When looking down at an unburnt shrub, how much ground is visible between the leaves?
Less than 25% of the ground is visible.
Less than half the ground is visible, and the shrub is at least 1.5 m long or wide.
Less than half the ground is visible, but the shrub is less than 1.5 m long or wide
Can see more ground than leaves or twigs, and the shrub is at least 1.5 m long or wide.
Can see more ground than leaves or twigs, and the shrub is smaller than 1.5 m long or wide.
All green growth associated at the base of shrubs, trees or apparently out in the open. Include seedlings in the approximate area.
Face one direction and take a portrait-oriented photo that includes near-surface and taller shrubs/trees.
Dominant vegetation in elevated layer before burn
Record first few letters of species common name or Scientific name (genus/species). i.e., for Jarrah use 'Jar' or 'Eucmar'
How much area did the elevated fuel cover before the burn? First ask, was it more than half (50%)? Then ask if it was more than 25% or more than 75%.
How much of the original crown is intact and still green?
How many grass trees still have skirts?
Density of bare shrubs at least 0.5 m tall
How many bare sticks w/no green or brown leaves are still standing?
Moderate (sometimes brush against sticks when walking thru area)
Medium dense (often brush against sticks when walking thru area)
Dense (have to push sticks aside to walk thru area)
Face in a different direction than before and take a portrait-oriented photo that includes near-surface and taller shrubs/trees.
Dominant vegetation of understorey before burn
Record first few letters of species common name or Scientific name (genus/species). i.e., for Jarrah use 'Jar' or 'Eucmar'
How much area did the intermediate/understorey fuel cover before the burn? First ask, was it more than half (50%)? Then ask if it was more than 25% or more than 75%.
How much original crown is intact and still green?
What is the lowest level where most trees in this stratum are resprouting?
How high does fresh black char extend up the trees in this stratum?
Face in a different direction than before and take a portrait-oriented photo that includes near-surface and taller shrubs/trees.
Dominant vegetation of canopy before burn
Record first few letters of species common name or Scientific name (genus/species). i.e., for Jarrah use 'Jar' or 'Eucmar'
How much area did the over-storey/canopy fuel cover before the burn? First ask, was it more than half (50%)? Then ask if it was more than 25% or more than 75%.
How much of the original crown is intact and still green?
How many trees > 20 cm diameter have fallen after the burn?
What is the lowest level where most trees in this stratum are resprouting?
How high does fresh black char extend up the trees in this stratum?
Take a photo looking up into the canopy.
Number of standing trees > 20 cm diameter
Number of standing trees with hollows

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Value must be between 0 and anything
Value must be between 0 and anything
Value must be between 0 and anything
Value must be between 0 and anything
Value must be between 0 and anything
Value must be between 0 and anything
